trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
There were no other sightings in Boise on or around August 31st 1995
divs: Sighting Details1.i was in the upstairs of my parents house, looking out the window, talking onthe phone at approx. 330 a.m.2.an elctric blue sliver appeared in the sky , right after i looked out thewindow, at the space in the sky where it appeared.3. i couldnt tell what the object was, i know it wasnt anything i have ever seenbefore though, i am extremely skeptical or at least was, i looked for blinkinglights, space debris, helicopter,anything to identify it, and was at a loss.4.once i realized i had never seen anything like it, i got out of the hammockthat i was lieing inin my bedroom, and walked to the window, curious as i haveever been. then found myself telling the girl to hold on a sec. i think i seesomething, then found myself opening up the window, and taking off the screen. istuck my head out the window.5.the object floated in the air for a good 4-5 minutes, doing nothing, nobobbing, no swaying, perfectly still, and when i got out of my hammock, itstarted to move,slowly, smoothly , without jerking forward, at this point iinvoluntarily opened the window, and stuck my upper-half of my body out of thewindow, and as soon as i did that it shot, like a bolt of straight lightningacross the sky, leaving a burned image of blue in my mind, not a tracer, but aengraved memory. at this point i dropped the phone and....i guess ill tell youthe rest in person or something, this would be the confidential part i suppose.7. it shot, at the speed of frickin light, as far as i could see, in a straightline, not far above the city, or so it seemed, i couldnt help to start crying.infact everytime i do tell the story, tears come to my eyes and i feel very funnyinside, like i do right now typing.its about time i come forward with thisstory, in fact, i have talked to one of your representatives in
Summary: electric blue sliver in the sky
